byline.original: By NICK CUMMING-BRUCE and CHOE SANG-HUN
byline.contributor: Nick Cumming-Bruce reported from Geneva, and Choe Sang-Hun from Seoul, South Korea.

abstract: United States and North Korea begin two days of talks that will serve as groundwork for wider discussions on North Korea's nuclear program.
snippet: Two days of discussions are meant to determine whether six-nation nuclear negotiations would be worthwhile.
lead_paragraph: Two days of discussions are meant to determine whether six-nation nuclear negotiations would be worthwhile.

headline.main: U.S. and North Korea Begin Groundwork for Talks
headline.print_headline: U.S. and North Korea Begin Groundwork for Talks
